description:
The monster grabs Millhiore and flees the fortress on a rampage. Sink struggles to reach the princess before she is absorbed by the creature, while she learns that the monster is actually a fox deity cub whose body was pierced by a cursed sword.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Hero, Princess and the Light of Hope
Yuusha to Hime to Kibou no Hikari
